This is a list of packages to be built within the CYBOP project.
Packages which are NOT implemented yet are put in brackets [].


CYBOP
_____

cybop.deb [meta package]
- depends:      cybop-books, cybop-papers, cybop-presentations
- category:     doc

[cybop-books.deb]
- recommends:   cybop-papers, cybop-presentations
- suggests:     cyboi, cybol-examples
- category:     doc
- files:        /usr/share/doc/cybop/books/* (source: /doc/books/*)

cybop-papers.deb
- recommends:   cybop-books, cybop-presentations
- suggests:     cyboi, cybol-examples
- category:     doc
- files:        /usr/share/doc/cybop/papers/* (source: /doc/papers/*)

cybop-presentations.deb
- recommends:   cybop-books, cybop-papers
- suggests:     cyboi, cybol-examples
- category:     doc
- files:        /usr/share/doc/cybop/presentations/* (source: /doc/presentations/*)


CYBOI
_____

cyboi.deb
- depends:      libc6, xlibs, libxml2
- recommends:   cybol-core, cybol-examples, cybol-healthcare
- suggests:     cyboi-doc, cyboi-dev
- category:     interpreters
- files:        /usr/bin/cyboi (source: /bin/cyboi)
                /usr/share/doc/cyboi/README.Debian
                /usr/share/doc/cyboi/changelog.gz
                /usr/share/doc/cyboi/copyright
                /usr/share/man/man1/cyboi1.gz (source: /doc/cyboi/cyboi.1.gz)

cyboi-dev.deb
- depends:      libc6, xlibs, libxml2, libxml2-dev
- suggests:     cyboi
- category:     devel
- files:        /usr/share/doc/cyboi-dev/Makefile (source: /admin/Makefile)
                /usr/share/doc/cyboi-dev/exclude (source: /admin/exclude)
                /usr/share/doc/cyboi-dev/README.Debian
                /usr/share/doc/cyboi-dev/changelog.gz
                /usr/share/doc/cyboi-dev/copyright

cyboi-doc.deb
- recommends:   cybop-doc-papers, cybop-doc-presentations
- suggests:     cyboi
- category:     doc
- files:        /usr/share/doc/cyboi-doc/manual.txt (source: /doc/cyboi/manual.txt)
                /usr/share/doc/cyboi-doc/README.Debian
                /usr/share/doc/cyboi-doc/changelog.gz
                /usr/share/doc/cyboi-doc/copyright


CYBOL
_____

cybol-examples.deb
- depends:      cyboi
- suggests:     cybol-core, cybol-healthcare
- category:     misc
- files:        /usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/addition/run.cybol (source: /examples/addition/run.cybol)
                /usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/addition/startup.cybol (source: /examples/addition/startup.cybol)
                /usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/exit/run.cybol (source: /examples/exit/run.cybol)
                /usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/exit_cybol_file/exit.cybol (source: /examples/exit_cybol_file/exit.cybol)
                /usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/exit_cybol_file/run.cybol (source: /examples/exit_cybol_file/run.cybol)
                /usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/exit_text_file/exit.txt (source: /examples/exit_text_file/exit.txt)
                /usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/exit_text_file/run.cybol (source: /examples/exit_text_file/run.cybol)
                /usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/helloworld/run.cybol (source: /examples/helloworld/run.cybol)
                /usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/helloworld/startup.cybol (source: /examples/helloworld/startup.cybol)
                /usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/helloworld_dynamic_logic/run.cybol (source: /examples/helloworld_dynamic_logic/run.cybol)
                /usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/helloworld_dynamic_logic/send_greeting.cybol (source: /examples/helloworld_dynamic_logic/send_greeting.cybol)
                /usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/helloworld_dynamic_logic/shutdown.cybol (source: /examples/helloworld_dynamic_logic/shutdown.cybol)
                /usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/helloworld_dynamic_logic/startup.cybol (source: /examples/helloworld_dynamic_logic/startup.cybol)

[cybol-core.deb]
- depends:      cyboi
- suggests:     cybol-healthcare
- category:     misc (better "base")
- files:        /usr/share/cybol/core/* (source: /cybol/core/*)

[cybol-healthcare.deb]
- depends:      cyboi, cybol-core
- suggests:     resmedicinae
- category:     misc (better "science", "health", "med")
- files:        /usr/share/cybol/healthcare/* (source: /cybol/healthcare/*)


Res Medicinae
_____________

resmedicinae.deb
- depends:      cyboi, cybol-healthcare
- recommends:   resadmin
- suggests:     resmedicinae-doc, resmedicinae-analysis
- category:     misc (better "science"; "health" or "med" do unfortunately not exist)
- files:        /usr/share/resmedicinae/*

resmedicinae-doc.deb
- recommends:   resmedicinae
- suggests:     linuxdoc-tools
- category:     doc
- files:        /usr/share/doc/resmedicinae/manual.* (source: /doc/manuals/*)

resmedicinae-analysis.deb
(CAUTION! This package already exists in "Sarge", where it is called "resmed-doc".
Andreas Tille is the maintainer. The package belongs to the meta package "med-doc".
It should be renamed to "resmedicinae-analysis". Please contact Andreas Tille!)
- recommends:   resmedicinae
- suggests:     linuxdoc-tools
- category:     doc
- files:        /usr/share/doc/resmedicinae/analysis.* (source: /doc/analysis/*)

resadmin.deb
- depends:      cyboi, cybol-core, cybol-healthcare
- recommends:   resmedicinae
- suggests:     resmedicinae-doc, resmedicinae-analysis
- category:     misc
- files:        /usr/share/resadmin/* (source: /share/resadmin/*)


Necessary Package Information to be Provided to Maintainer
__________________________________________________________

- name
- version
- dependencies
- category
- list of files with source and destination directory
- README.Debian
- changelog
- copyright
- man page
